title: Retry build and deploy with no code changes

requirements.text: Retry the exact same build and deploy process with no code changes (same source state/commit) and attempt to deploy to the network again.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is executed without modifying any frontend or backend source files
Deployment completes successfully without the prior deployment error
The deployed app is reachable and loads its existing functionality as-is

constraints: Do not make any code changes (frontend or backend).
Do not change assets, caching rules, or service worker behavior as part of this request.
nonGoals: Fixing the underlying cause of the deployment error (unless it is resolved by a clean retry with no code changes).
Any UI/UX changes or design adjustments.
